title: (x) Slab serif magazine heads - Soho {Marc O}
content:
Hi,

Anobody have an idea of the name of this font?

Thanks

 [‹ (x) Condensed sans on wedding invitation - Akzidenz-Grotesk Cnd {Simon H}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071230112015/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40364 "Go to previous forum topic") [Log printout in Lost television show ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071230112015/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40367 "Go to next forum topic")
author: alainch

comments.content:
The nearest I found for the black letter is [FF Zine Slab Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20071230112015/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/fontfont/ff_zine_slab_display_black_roman/?sample_text=HOT%20ON%20SCENT&sample_size=48&acs_p=1&acs_pt=24&acs=1)

- - -

alainch
Not quite that either. Notice the A, N and G. Overall Zine Slab is closer for Gold.jpg and Hot.jpg, but Lubalin is closer for Beach.jpg.

You’re right, this is Soho

Thanks to all

- - -

alainch
Hrm, I checked both Myfonts and Identifont and Soho was never mentioned. Oh well, si c’est la vie.
MyFonts and Identifont don’t have everything. Monotype is one of many foundries who are slow to update these sites with new releases.

\*Shakes fist in frustration at Monotype and Stephen’s astute observation\*

Well, I guess I’ll have to expand my search parameters in the future...
